en.advantage_brief: UOS cloud service platform as the first to fully follow the OpenStack standard cloud platform, we continue to improve, to provide users with quality products and services.
en.advantage_five_brief_one: With distributed storage, each copy has 3 copies
en.advantage_five_brief_two: Private network isolation, even if the other users on the platform can not sniff
en.advantage_four_brief_one: Full support for the OpenStack standard API
en.advantage_one_brief_one: 10 seconds to complete the creation of an arbitrary size of the cloud host
en.advantage_one_brief_two: Support real-time snapshot of the hard disk, a capacity of 1T hard drive snapshot operation, time-consuming less than 1 second
en.advantage_three_brief_one: Supports web panel / CLI / API operations
en.advantage_three_brief_three: Supports fully autonomous definition of network architecture and topology
en.advantage_three_brief_two: Cloud host hard drive, network card and other support for disassembly and assembly
en.advantage_two_brief_one: Billing in seconds, on-demand real-time settlement
en.advantage_two_brief_three: Cloud hard disk support real-time expansion
en.advantage_two_brief_two: The cloud host supports real-time configuration changes
en.caller_one_part: For you to deliver more scarce, more commercial value
en.classify_four_detail: If you have a dream, welcome to join the UnitedStack.
en.classify_one_detail: UnitedStack is also your business partners.
en.classify_three_detail: UnitedStack leading education and training system
en.classify_brief: Safe, open, tested UOS 4.0, paved the way for your business data center cloud.
en.classify_two_detail: UnitedStack will 24x7x365 timely contact with you.
en.crosswise_four_detail: Clouds UOS covers system architecture, security, and functionality
en.crosswise_one_detail: Software defines the data center o&m, management, construction
en.crosswise_three_detail: Fast, reliable, flexible visual monitoring, one step cloud platform o&m
en.crosswise_two_detail: UnitedStack opens the API for all cloud services completely
en.experts_brief: Private cloud solutions help enterprises to achieve self-control
en.framework_brief: UOS supports OpenStack Core IaaS services and is seamlessly integrated with platform services including Hadoop Data Ecology and Cloud Foundary PaaS. Provide capacity expansion and value-added for enterprise data centers.
en.show_one_detail: So that the private data center has a large public cloud capacity, transparent Internet experience
en.show_two_detail: To meet the future enterprise data center cloud long-term needs, always in the latest version.
en.show_three_detail: According to the customer's actual business scenarios, construction of private cloud data center.
en.title: UnitedStack有云
en.uos_brief: Safe, stable, and open of enterprise-class cloud platform
en.win_flag: Cloud, share to create a win-win situation, for millions of developers to provide the world's leading cloud computing service platform

zh.advantage_brief: UOS 云服务平台作为国内第一个完全遵循 OpenStack 标准的云平台，我们不断提高，为用户提供优质的产品和服务。
zh.advantage_five_brief_one: 采用分布式存储，每份存储都有3份复制
zh.advantage_five_brief_two: 私有网络隔离，即使平台上的其他用户也无法嗅探
zh.advantage_four_brief_one: 完全支持 OpenStack 标准 API
zh.advantage_one_brief_one: 10秒完成对一台任意大小的云主机的创建
zh.advantage_one_brief_two: 支持对云硬盘实时快照，对一块容量为1T的硬盘进行快照操作，耗时不到1秒
zh.advantage_three_brief_one: 支持 web 面板 /CLI/API 操作
zh.advantage_three_brief_three: 支持完全自主定义网络架构和拓扑
zh.advantage_three_brief_two: 云主机的硬盘、网卡等支持随意拆卸和组装
zh.advantage_two_brief_one: 按秒计费，按需实时结算
zh.advantage_two_brief_two: 云主机支持实时更改配置
zh.caller_one: 我们不卖硬件，不卖软件，
zh.caller_one_part: 而为您交付更稀缺、更有商业价值的
zh.classify_four_detail: 如果你对 OpenStack 抱有追求，对人生怀有梦想，欢迎加入有云。
zh.classify_one_detail: 进取与创新成就我们，有云不只是您的服务商，更是您的伙伴。
zh.classify_three_detail: 有云成就 OpenStack 技术专家，领先的的开源云教育和培训体系。
zh.classify_brief: 安全、开放、历经考验的 UOS 4.0，为您的企业数据中心云化铺平了第一道路。
zh.classify_two_detail: 有云用心为您服务，无论何时何地，有云24x7x365与您联系。
zh.crosswise_four_detail: 有云 UOS 技术类文档涵盖了系统架构、安全以及功能
zh.crosswise_one_detail: 软件定义数据中心的运维、管理、建设及硬件选型参考
zh.crosswise_three_detail: 快速、可靠、灵活的可视化监控，一步到位的云平台运维
zh.crosswise_two_detail: UnitedStack 向您完全开放所有云服务的 API 和部署配置选项
zh.experts_brief: 面向未来的全栈式企业私有云解决方案帮助企业实现自主可控
zh.framework_brief: UOS 支持 OpenStack 核心 IaaS 服务，也能够与包含 Hadoop 大数据生态和 Cloud Foundary PaaS 等在内的平台服务做无缝整合。为企业数据中心提供能力扩展与增值。
zh.show_one_detail: 使私有数据中心拥有大型公有云的能力，使您拥有7×24小时运维、分布式架构和高效与透明的上网体验。
zh.show_two_detail: 满足未来企业数据中心云平台建设长远需求，即使远程更新也能做无中断的维护，保证始终处于最新的版本。
zh.show_three_detail: 完全的软件定义数据中心、极致的运维自动化，根据客户实际业务场景，规划和建设私有云数据中心。
zh.title: UnitedStack 有云
zh.uos_brief: 安全、稳定、开放的企业级云平台
zh.win_flag: 有云，分享创造共赢，为千万开发者提供全球领先的云计算服务平台
